name: Moody (TOoOngYu)
description:
Student Project by Tong Yu (code) and Zixuan Wang (art).

Game Rules:

The balls are divided into happy balls and sad balls.

The properties of the areas depend on the type of the majority of the balls.

The balls and areas affect each other.

By dragging and dropping the balls, the task of the game is to make all areas the desired goal of each level.
